short_desc: This chapter is a sub-unit of the American Civil Liberties Union of Northern California
description: This chapter is a sub-unit of the American Civil Liberties Union of Northern California. Meetings are usually held at 7pm (dinner before starts at 6:30) on the third Wednesday of every month at Sweet Basil Thai Cuisine in Berkeley.Seeks volunteers to help with advocacy efforts for marriage equality, ending the death penalty, reproductive rights, police practices, immigrants' rights, and the recently launched Schools for All campaign.
